Discover GPT Reader: A Free Text-to-Speech Chrome Extension

GPT Reader is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your online reading experience. By leveraging the advanced capabilities of OpenAI's ChatGPT text-to-speech (TTS) technology, GPT Reader offers a high-quality auditory version of any selected text on web pages, making information more accessible and your browsing experience more enjoyable.

**Getting Started Is Easy:**
Once you've added GPT Reader to your Chrome browser, click on the extension icon and enter your ChatGPT API key to activate the features. Then, choose a voice that you like from a variety of options to make listening a pleasure.

**How It Works:**
While browsing, simply highlight the text you're interested in and right-click to find the option to "Read Aloud." GPT Reader will then display a convenient banner at the top of your page with controls to play, pause, and replay the content. You can also adjust the narration speed to suit your preference.

**Designed With You in Mind:**
- **Adaptable Theme:** GPT Reader matches your browser's theme, whether you're using light or dark mode, ensuring a seamless integration into your browsing experience.
- **Language Diversity:** Embracing global diversity, GPT Reader supports 14 languages and dialects, including Bengali, German, English, Spanish, French, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Vietnamese, Chinese Simplified, and Chinese Traditional, making it versatile for users worldwide.

**Easy to Dismiss:**
We've designed GPT Reader to be as unobtrusive as possible. You can easily close the top banner by clicking outside it or by hitting the close button, keeping your browsing experience clean and uninterrupted.

GPT Reader is not just another extension; it's a tool created to make the web more accessible and enjoyable for everyone. Whether you're learning a new language, trying to multitask, or simply prefer listening to reading, GPT Reader is here to enhance your browsing, free of charge. Give it a try and transform the way you interact with online content.
